name: Stoppy Bots
description:
Stoppy Bots is a Red Light Green Light Runner game that takes place in the future.

The controls are simple enough that anyone can pick it up and start playing. You will encounter obstacles along the way as you try to earn more gold and get as far as you can without falling through the platforms, crashing into a wall or running a Red light.

Make sure you pay attention to the Traffic Light at the top of the screen!

You can run on green light, you can run on yellow light, however you have to be STOPPED BEFORE the light turns RED.

Use your turbo to go super fast.
Collect Green Powerups to temporarily change the light to green.
Collect Turbo Powerups to refresh your turbo.

Level up your skills to earn more gold, make your turbo last longer and make the green light last longer.

Do you think you have what it takes to become a Stoppy Bot champion? Best of luck to you all and thanks for your support.
